name: Sweden - Satsang with Santhi
food: Vegetarian food, Coffe/Tea will be served
coursereq: Those interested in exploring the depths of one-self
materials: It is good to bring notebook/pen and a pillow to sit on and. Handouts will be given.
description:
School of Santhi invites you to a beautiful weekend Satsang with Santhi in Stockholm.


The word Satsang comes from Sanskrit, meaning to associate with true people, to be in the company of true people. This weekend will give you the possibility to understand the answers for many of your questions in life.


Santhi has a unique approach to make you look inside, see your own life and understand the meaning of your existence. This satsang aims to give you the keys needed to open up and look inside yourself, which is the start for making the changes you are looking for in life. All participants will get the opportunity to ask their personal questions and Santhi will sublimely guide you into finding the answers on your own.


Santhi's teachings are suitable for people of all faiths, as well as both beginners and experienced practitioners. The benefits of his teachings have been tested and proven by time.


For information on the venue, fee and other details, please contact: ingridbergstrand@ymail.com
